name: vagrant
description: This is a pre-release of the WOW project. Its goal is to show why JAMstack architecture and HUGO are valuable tools for this project, and understand how we can work with theme. ## Getting Started These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project on a live system. ### Prerequisites * Install [Vagrant](https://www.vagrantup.com/docs/installation/) * Clone the repository
